data.text: We had a great experience at this hotel in September 2023. We felt very safe in the area, the room was nice and clean and the breakfast buffet was great. It is not central but we enjoyed the location, there were lots of places to eat on Rambla del Poblenou which was just a short walk away (we recommend Zozan Restaurant), the beach was only about a 10 minute walk and many other sights were only 2 to 3km away. We walked to the hop on hop off bus stop and used that as transportation to other areas in the city. I would stay here again if I were to go back to Barcelona.
data.title: Happy with our stay :)

data.text: Hotel room was stuffy and suffocating. There was no airconditioning. Staff did not  inform us of this on arrival, nor is it mentioned on their website.  After complaining, on the last night, the hotel provided a small table fan that made creaky sounds. Was very difficult to sleep for the 3 nights we were there as it was extremely hot.  The hotel staff were unapologetic saying this was "winter".
data.title: Terrible room experience - no air conditioning

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr Vinay;

Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at Holiday Inn Express BARCELONA - CITY 22@.

Please know that your feedback is extremely valuable to us. We use feedback, such as yours, to continuously make changes to our brand to improve the guest experience. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to serve you again in the future.

Again, thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Express, and if I can be of assistance to you, please contact me directly at 0034 934338400 or express.barcelonacity@continentalhotels.eu.
owner_response.author: Myriam Sanchez

data.text:
The issue I had was a noisy neighbour. There was a connecting door in my room to the room adjacent. Two men speaking very loudly and with zero sound insulation I felt they were shouting in my room. They slammed their door going in and out. And all this in the evening and late at night. I really regretted having spent the night here. 

The staff were professional and amenities were simple and clean. Breakfast was good. 

But for a business stay while not expensive I could not recommend it
data.title: Noisy. Not good for business stop over.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Adrian D.

Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay. All comments are very important for us because it helps a lot to improve our service.

We regret that you were not able to rest as you expected due to the noise made in the room next to yours. I don't know if he contacted reception or not, because we could have checked if we had availability to try to change his room.

We are very happy that you felt well cared for by our staff and that you found the facilities clean.

Thank you again for your comments and we hope you give us a new opportunity in the future.

Best Regards,

Carme Trullols
GSM
owner_response.author: Myriam Sanchez

data.text:
We booked a room for 10 days from booking.com for this hotel, there was no other option but non- refundable, We had a problem on our way to this accommodation. It was related to the passport expiration date. Our children's passports' expiration date was a little less then 3 months. (We didn't know about 3 months terms!) We had applied to get new passports for our kids more then 1 month ago. But these new passports are produced in Ukraine and we still couldn't get them.  Our flight tickets were also canceled, and we have got a refund for the flight we couldn't take. (Which was also non-refundable). There is no such thing as non-refundable, a company can make a penalty cut, but still you get some money back for services which you were not able to use. We are in Turkey now and very upset. Our vacation was ruined. We notified the facility and canceled the reservation as soon as possible. However,  we suggested a partly money refund or another option for those days when we are not able to receive accommodation + breakfast, service. We are planning to go to Barcelona in April. We expect to have new passports ready in March.  We wanted to postpone our stay in this hotel, but the hotel's management didn't agree. The hotel refused all other options. We spoke with Miss Carma, and she didn't offer any help. Do you consider it as good customer service? We would never again use any of the facilities of Holiday Inn. 
As you can see we have been to a lot of different hotels in different locations, so if I say Holiday Inn is not worth it you may believe me
data.title: Big Disappointment

user_location.name: Izmir, Izmir Province, Turkish Aegean Coast

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Haykolzmir,

Thank you for your comments about your reservation made through Booking.com

Unfortunately, as I informed you by phone and also by e-mail through our Guest Relations department, your reservation was made through Booking.com and choosing the prepaid rate that offers a cheaper rate but with certain restrictions that do not allow change dates or process refunds.

As Guest Relations from IHG informed you, when making reservations through a third-party intermediary such as Booking.com, guests pay them directly as agreed upon at the time of their reservation confirmation, in this case to Booking.com

That is why unfortunately we cannot make refunds or process change of dates. We have different rates at the hotel and if you had chosen the flexible rate, it allows cancellations with a minimum of 24 hours, but not with a prepaid rate.

Best Regards,

Carme Trullols
Guest Service Manager
owner_response.author: Myriam Sanchez

data.text:
The hotel has a great location:  many places, such as the beach, restaurants, parks and stores, are within walking distance.

It is a very crowded place with many customers, so do not expect personal attention. On the first day, they did not even offer a courtesy drink while waiting for the room, and that was disappointing. Personal attention could go a long way.

The room was decent and clean, but the bathroom was a tad old and needed a refresh. The buffet has a lot of options but there are so many customers that it feels very industrial and it may be hard to find a seat.

Overall, a decent hotel but service could be improved on.
data.title: An average hotel in a great location

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hi gabejol,

Thank you for selecting IHG Hotels & Resorts for all your travel needs and for staying in Holiday Inn Express Barcelona- City 22. Here we strive to provide quality essentials, delivered with depth and highlighted with purposeful detail.

I read your remarks and am sorry you found our property not to the standards you are accustomed to from a quality chain like ours. I understand your sentiments and thank you for allowing us to look into these matters. We did not want our guests to experience these issues, and with this in mind, I distributed your comments to our area managers. We have taken immediate action to avoid this from happening again.

When you have time, come and visit us. I know you will enjoy the new changes.

All the best,

Oscar C.
Case Manager
IHG Hotel & Resorts Services
owner_response.author: IHG Service
